title: Resilience to climate change by improving air circulation efficiency and pollutant dispersion in cities: A 3D-UFO approach to urban block design
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Mehdi Makvandi, Philip F. Yuan, Qunfeng Ji, Chuancheng Li, Mohamed Elsadek, Wenjing Li, Ahmad Hassan, Yu Li
